title: Understanding Data Inventory Tags
text: Consider how your data inventory tags can be used to manage data effectively. Think about their role in data classification and retention policies.

hintAnswer: Your tags are representations of your data classification
title: Role of Tags in Data Classification
text: How do tags help in data classification?
choices: You can configure your tags with retention policies so that your automated deletion programs can process deletion at scale
Your tags are representations of your data classification

hintAnswer: You can configure your tags with retention policies so that your automated deletion programs can process deletion at scale
title: Tags and Retention Policies
text: How can tags be configured to assist with data retention policies?
choices: You can configure your tags with retention policies so that your automated deletion programs can process deletion at scale
Your tags are representations of your data classification

title: Comprehensive Understanding of Tags

choices: You can configure your tags with retention policies so that your automated deletion programs can process deletion at scale
